person.persName: John C. Nauts (Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and ironware merchant)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and ironware merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Francis Anthony Nauts and Ann Carr Nauts. Married to Virginia Ann Boone Nauts in Louisville, Kentucky, on February 25, 1858. Father of Alfred Nauts, William B. Nauts, John C. Nauts, and Virginia B. Nauts. Clerk in Louisville in 1860. Clerk in Louisville in 1861. Clerk in Louisville in 1863. Ironware merchant in partnership with William C. Reamer in Nauts & Reamer in Louisville in 1865.
